name: Color Balls 3D
description:
Your main goal is to fill the basket with the amount of Balls you're given.

The challenge is to figure out how.

Turn, adjust, and interact with the board however you like!

Hold to set the levers and gates for balls to fall through.

Control the flow of balls afterwards.

It's easy to begin, deceptively hard to master.

Addicting nevertheless!
publishers: Good Job Games Bilisim Yazilim ve Pazarlama AS
